meanings.definition: A person who blazes a trail or leads the way.
meanings.sent1: The trailbreaker guided us through the forest.
meanings.sent2: The trailbreaker hiked ahead to mark the path for us.
meanings.sent3: The trailbreaker made sure we didn't get lost in the woods.
meanings.sent4: She was a trailbreaker in the literal sense, always exploring new paths.
meanings.sent5: The trailbreaker's footsteps were the only guide in the dense forest.

meanings.definition: A machine or vehicle used to clear a path through rough terrain.
meanings.sent1: The trailbreaker bulldozer cleared the way for the construction crew.
meanings.sent2: The trailbreaker snowplow removed the snow from the mountain road.
meanings.sent3: The trailbreaker ATV made off-roading look easy.
meanings.sent4: The trailbreaker machine carved through the rocky landscape effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The trailbreaker vehicle left a smooth path in the rugged wilderness.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that pioneers or innovates in a particular field.
meanings.sent1: She was a trailbreaker in the world of technology, always introducing new ideas.
meanings.sent2: The trailbreaker scientist discovered a groundbreaking cure for the disease.
meanings.sent3: The trailbreaker artist's unique style set trends in the art community.
meanings.sent4: The trailbreaker entrepreneur revolutionized the industry with their innovative approach.
meanings.sent5: The trailbreaker inventor's creations changed the way we live our lives.
